mapper.select: SELECT * from t_sys_user where username = #{value} and del_flag = 'N'

select u.*, group_concat(ur.role_id) as 'roleIds', (select d.name from t_sys_dept d where d.id = u.dept_id) deptName from t_sys_user u left join t_sys_user_role ur on u.id = ur.user_id
u.${k} like concat('%',#{params[${k}]},'%')
group by u.id
select m.menu_perms from t_sys_user_role ur LEFT JOIN t_sys_role_menu rm on ur.role_id = rm.role_id LEFT JOIN t_sys_menu m on rm.menu_id = m.id where ur.user_id = #{userId}
